name: Mimitroid
description:
Description:
You have landed on an alien world, explore the tunnels of this world and discover what they hide but be warned the walls may not be what they appear to be.

Controls:
Mouse: Control Camera
WASD: Move
Mouse + Left Click: Shoot (Hold for charged show when upgrade is acquired)
Mouse + Right Click: Fire Missiles (when upgrade is acquired)
Spacebar: Jump (Hold for higher jump when upgrade is acquired, press again while in air to space jump when upgrade is acquired)
